snippet.title: Scourge Outbreak Trailer
snippet.description:
Scourge Outbreak Trailer. Join us on Facebook : http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial ! Set in the near future, players take on the role of one of the members of Echo Squad, a group of mercenaries who were hired by The Tarn Initiative to attack a power-hungry and evil Corporation.

Scourge Outbreak Trailer. Release date : 2012 on PS3, Xbox 360 and Mac. Suscribe now to get all gameplay trailers and videos !
